RockHeardle.com - Pixel ".concat(todaysDate.toLocaleDateString());var scoreEmoji="";// Limit the loop to iterate only 4 times or until the end of the guesses array
for(var i=0;i<Math.min(guesses.length,4);i++){var guess=guesses[i];if(guess.isCorrect===true){scoreEmoji+=emojis.correct;}else if(guess.skipped===true){scoreEmoji+=emojis.skip;}else if(guess.isCorrect===false){scoreEmoji+=emojis.incorrect;}else{scoreEmoji+=emojis.empty;}}return"".concat(prefix," ").concat(scoreEmoji);}
